Algorithms Project 01, Team Camaro

remain valid subject to their having been granted in compliance with the terms and conditions hereof Article MISCELLANEOUS EXCUSABLE EVENTS Neither Party shall be liable for any or all or failure to following a virus intervention by government natural water strikes and labor etc Any failure by either on one or more to invoke one or more of the provisions shall under no circumstances be interpreted as being a waiver by the interested Party of its right to invoke said whether written or between the Parties and having the same and constitutes the entirety of the agreement between said Parties concerning said purpose No supplement or modification to the terms and conditions hereof shall be effective as between the Parties unless it is made in writing and signed by their duly authorized representatives In the event that one or more of the provisions hereof were to conflict with a current or future applicable act or legislative said act or legislative text shall and the Parties shall make the necessary amendments so as to comply with said act or legislative text All other provisions shall remain effective invalidity of a provision of the for any reason shall not cause the Agreement as a whole to be invalid LANGUAGE The Agreement is drafted in both French and English and both versions are deemed authentic Article NEW VERSIONS OF THE AGREEMENT Any person is authorized to duplicate and distribute copies of this Agreement So as to ensure the wording of this Agreement is protected and may only be modified by the authors of the who reserve the right to periodically publish updates or new versions of the each with a separate number These subsequent versions may address new issues encountered by Free Software Any Software distributed under a given version of the Agreement may only be subsequently distributed under the same version of the Agreement or a subsequent version Article GOVERNING LAW AND JURISDICTION The Agreement is governed by French law The Parties agree to endeavor to seek an amicable solution to any disagreements or disputes that may arise during the performance of the Agreement Failing an amicable solution within two (2) months as from their occurrence

the Licensor undertakes to have the transferees subscribe to the obligations set forth in this paragraph RIGHT OF USE The Licensee is authorized to use the without any limitation as to its fields of with it being hereinafter specified that this comprises

torts and intellectual property and the protection that it offers to both authors and holders of the economic rights over software The authors of the CeCILL C *(for Ce[a] C[nrs] I[nria] L[logiciel] L[ibre]) license are ii the first time the Licensee exercises any of the rights granted hereunder One copy of the containing a notice relating to the characteristics of the to the limited and to the fact that its use is restricted to experienced users has been provided to the Licensee prior to its acceptance as set forth in Article and the Licensee hereby acknowledges that it has read and understood it Article EFFECTIVE DATE AND TERM EFFECTIVE DATE The Agreement shall become effective on the date when it is accepted by the Licensee as set forth in Article TERM The Agreement shall remain in force for the entire legal term of protection of the economic rights over the Software Article SCOPE OF RIGHTS GRANTED The Licensor hereby grants to the who the following rights over the Software for any or all and for the term of the on the basis of the terms and conditions set forth hereinafter if the Licensor owns or comes to own one or more patents protecting all or part of the functions of the Software or of its the Licensor undertakes not to enforce the rights granted by these patents against successive Licensees exploiting or modifying the Software If these patents are the Licensor undertakes to have the transferees subscribe to the obligations set forth in this paragraph RIGHT OF USE The Licensee is authorized to use the without any limitation as to its fields of with it being hereinafter specified that this or storing the Software on any or all medium entitlement to study or test its operation so as to determine the ideas and principles behind any or all constituent elements of said Software This shall apply when the Licensee carries out any or all transmission or storage operation as regards the that it is entitled to carry out hereunder RIGHT OF MODIFICATION The right of modification includes the right to or make any or all modifications to the and the right to reproduce the resulting Software It in the right to create a Derivative Software The Licensee is authorized to make any or all modification to the Software provided that it includes an notice that it is the author of said modification and indicates the date of the creation thereof RIGHT OF DISTRIBUTION In the right of distribution includes the right to transmit and communicate the Software to the general public on any or all and by any or all and the right to either in consideration of a or free of one or more copies of the Software by any means The Licensee is further authorized to distribute copies of the modified or unmodified Software to third parties according to the terms and conditions set forth hereinafter DISTRIBUTION OF SOFTWARE WITHOUT MODIFICATION The Licensee is authorized to distribute true copies of the Software in Source Code or Object Code form

provided that said distribution complies with all the provisions of the Agreement and is accompanied a notice relating to the limitation of both the Licensor s warranty and liability as set forth in Articles and in the event that only the Object Code of the Software is the Licensee allows effective access to the full Source Code of the Software at a minimum during the entire period of its distribution of the it being understood that the additional cost of acquiring the Source Code shall not exceed the cost of transferring the data DISTRIBUTION OF MODIFIED SOFTWARE When the Licensee makes an Integrated Contribution to the the terms and conditions for the distribution of the resulting Modified Software become subject to all the provisions of this Agreement The Licensee is authorized to distribute the Modified in source code or object code provided that said distribution complies with all the provisions of the Agreement and is accompanied a notice relating to the limitation of both the Licensor s warranty and liability as set forth in Articles and in the event that only the object code of the Modified Software is the Licensee allows effective access to the full source code of the Modified Software at a minimum during the entire period of its distribution of the Modified it being understood that the additional cost of acquiring the source code shall not exceed the cost of transferring the data DISTRIBUTION OF DERIVATIVE SOFTWARE When the Licensee creates Derivative this Derivative Software may be distributed under a license agreement other than this subject to compliance with the requirement to include a notice concerning the rights over the Software as defined in Article In the event the creation of the Derivative Software required modification of the Source Code

Licensor does not either expressly or tacitly warrant that the Software does not infringe any third party intellectual property right relating to a software or any other property right the Licensor disclaims any and all liability towards the Licensee arising out of any or all proceedings for infringement that may be instituted in respect of the modification and redistribution of the Software should such proceedings be instituted against the the Licensor shall provide it with technical and legal assistance for its defense Such technical and legal assistance shall be decided on a case by case basis between the relevant Licensor and the Licensee pursuant to a memorandum of understanding The Licensor disclaims any and all liability as regards the Licensee s use of the name of the Software No warranty is given as regards the existence of prior rights over the name of the Software or as regards the existence of a trademark Article TERMINATION In the event of a breach by the Licensee of its obligations the Licensor may automatically terminate this Agreement modify or distribute the Software any licenses that it may have granted prior to termination of the Agreement shall remain valid subject to their having been granted in compliance with the terms and conditions hereof Article MISCELLANEOUS EXCUSABLE EVENTS Neither Party shall be liable for any or all or failure to perform the that may be attributable to an event of force an act of God or an outside such as defective functioning or interruptions of the electricity or telecommunications network paralysis following a virus intervention by government natural disasters

Software The Licensee undertakes not to directly or indirectly infringe the intellectual property rights of the Holder and or Contributors on the Software and to where vis à vis its any and all measures required to ensure respect of said intellectual property rights of the Holder and or Contributors Article RELATED SERVICES Under no circumstances shall the Agreement oblige the Licensor to provide technical assistance or maintenance services for the Software the Licensor is entitled to offer this type of services The terms and conditions of such technical and or such shall be set forth in a separate instrument Only the Licensor offering said maintenance and or technical assistance services shall incur liability therefor any Licensor is entitled to offer to its under its sole a that shall only be binding upon for the redistribution of the Software and or the Modified under terms and conditions that it is free to decide Said and the financial terms and conditions of its shall be subject of a separate instrument executed between the Licensor and the Licensee Article LIABILITY Subject to the provisions of the Licensee shall be entitled to claim compensation for any direct loss it may have suffered from the Software as a result of a fault on the part of the relevant subject to providing evidence thereof The Licensor s liability is limited to the commitments made under this case basis between the relevant Licensor and the Licensee pursuant to a memorandum of understanding The Licensor disclaims any and all liability as regards the Licensee s use of the name of the Software No warranty is given as regards the existence of prior rights over the name of the Software or as regards the existence of a trademark Article TERMINATION In the event of a breach by the Licensee of its obligations the Licensor may automatically terminate this Agreement modify or distribute the Software any licenses that it may have granted prior to termination of the Agreement shall remain valid subject to their having been granted in compliance with the terms and conditions hereof Article MISCELLANEOUS EXCUSABLE EVENTS Neither Party shall be liable for any or all or failure to perform the that may be attributable to an event of force an act of God or an outside such as defective functioning or interruptions of the electricity or telecommunications network paralysis following a virus intervention by government natural water strikes and labor etc Any failure by either on one or more to invoke one or more of the provisions hereof
 
to ensure that use of the its intellectual property notices and the fact that it is governed by the Agreement is indicated in a text that is easily specifically from the interface of any Derivative Software The Licensee undertakes not to directly or indirectly infringe the intellectual property rights of the Holder and or Contributors on the Software and to where vis à vis its any and all measures required to ensure respect of said intellectual property rights of the Holder and or Contributors Article RELATED SERVICES Under no circumstances shall the Agreement oblige the Licensor to provide technical assistance or maintenance services for the Software the Licensor is entitled to offer this type of services The terms and conditions of such technical and or such shall be set forth in a separate instrument Only the Licensor offering said maintenance and or technical assistance services shall incur liability therefor any Licensor is entitled to offer to its under its sole a that shall only be binding upon for the redistribution of the Software and or the Modified under terms and conditions that it is free to decide Said and the financial terms and conditions of its shall be subject of a separate instrument executed between the Licensor and the Licensee Article LIABILITY Subject to the provisions of the Licensee shall be entitled to claim compensation for any direct loss it may have suffered from the Software as a result of a fault on the part of the relevant subject to providing evidence thereof The Licensor s liability is limited to the commitments made under this be detected In this the Licensee s attention has been drawn to the risks associated with modifying and or developing and reproducing the Software which are reserved for experienced users The Licensee case basis between the relevant Licensor and the Licensee pursuant to a memorandum of understanding The Licensor disclaims any and all liability as regards the Licensee s use of the name of the Software No warranty is given as regards the existence of prior rights over the name of the Software or as regards the existence of a trademark Article TERMINATION In the event of a breach by the Licensee of its obligations the Licensor may automatically terminate this Agreement modify or distribute the Software any licenses that it may have granted prior to termination of the Agreement shall remain valid subject to their having been granted in compliance with the terms and conditions hereof Article MISCELLANEOUS EXCUSABLE EVENTS Neither Party shall be liable for any or all or failure to perform the that may be attributable to an event of force an act of God or an outside such as defective functioning or interruptions of the electricity or telecommunications network paralysis following a virus intervention by government natural water strikes and labor etc Any failure by either on one or more to invoke one or more of the provisions shall under no circumstances be interpreted as being a waiver by the interested Party of its right to invoke said whether written or between the Parties and having the same and constitutes the entirety of the agreement between said Parties concerning said purpose No supplement or modification to the terms and conditions hereof shall be effective as between the Parties unless it is made in writing and signed by their duly authorized representatives In the event that one or more of the provisions hereof were to conflict with a current or future applicable act or legislative said act or legislative text shall and the Parties shall make the necessary amendments so as to comply with said act or legislative text All other provisions shall remain effective invalidity of a provision of the for any reason shall not cause the Agreement as a whole to be invalid LANGUAGE The Agreement is drafted in both French and English and both versions are deemed authentic Article NEW VERSIONS OF THE AGREEMENT Any person is authorized to duplicate and distribute copies of this Agreement So as to ensure the wording of this Agreement is protected and may only be modified by the authors of the who reserve the right to periodically publish updates or new versions of the each with a separate number These subsequent versions may address new issues encountered by Free Software Any Software distributed under a given version of the Agreement may only be subsequently distributed under the same version of the Agreement or a subsequent version Article GOVERNING LAW AND JURISDICTION The Agreement is governed by French law The Parties agree to endeavor to seek an amicable solution to any disagreements or disputes that may arise during the performance of the Agreement Failing an amicable solution within and unless emergency proceedings are necessary

◆ agreement

it being understood that the additional cost of purchasing the source code of the Modified Software shall not exceed the cost of transferring the data COMPATIBILITY WITH THE CeCILL LICENSE When a Modified Software contains an Integrated Contribution subject to the CeCill license or when a Derivative Software contains a Related Module subject to the CeCill license agreement

following a virus intervention by government natural water strikes and labor etc Any failure by either on one or more to invoke one or more of the provisions shall under no circumstances be Parties concerning said purpose No supplement or modification to the terms and conditions hereof shall be effective as between the Parties unless it is made in writing and signed by their duly authorized representatives In the event that one or more of the provisions hereof were to conflict with a current or future applicable act or legislative said act or legislative text shall and the Parties shall make the necessary amendments so as to comply with said act or legislative text All other provisions shall remain effective invalidity of a provision of the for any reason shall not cause the Agreement as a whole to be invalid LANGUAGE The Agreement is drafted in both French and English and both versions are deemed authentic Article NEW VERSIONS OF THE AGREEMENT Any person is authorized to duplicate and distribute copies of this Agreement So as to ensure coherence

◆ faith

◆ license

it being understood that the additional cost of purchasing the source code of the Modified Software shall not exceed the cost of transferring the data COMPATIBILITY WITH THE CeCILL LICENSE When a Modified Software contains an Integrated Contribution subject to the CeCill license or when a Derivative Software contains a Related Module subject to the CeCill license the provisions set forth in the third item of Article are optional Article INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY OVER THE INITIAL SOFTWARE The Holder owns the economic rights over the Initial Software Any or all use of the Initial Software is subject to compliance with the terms and conditions under which the Holder has elected to distribute its work and no one shall be entitled to modify the terms and conditions for the distribution of said Initial Software The Holder undertakes that the Initial Software will remain ruled at least by the current license

◆ License

to ensure that use of the its intellectual property notices and the fact that it is governed by the Agreement is indicated in a text that is easily specifically from the interface of any Derivative Software The Licensee undertakes not to directly or indirectly infringe the intellectual property rights of the Holder and or Contributors on the Software and to where vis à vis its any and all measures required to ensure respect of said intellectual property rights of the Holder and or Contributors Article RELATED SERVICES Under no circumstances shall the Agreement oblige the Licensor to provide technical assistance or maintenance services for the Software the Licensor is entitled to offer this type of services The terms and conditions of such technical and or such shall be set forth in a separate instrument Only the Licensor offering said maintenance and or technical assistance services shall incur liability therefor any Licensor is entitled to offer to its under its sole a that shall only be binding upon for the redistribution of the Software and or the Modified under terms and conditions that it is free to decide Said and the financial terms and conditions of its shall be subject of a separate instrument executed between the Licensor and the Licensee Article LIABILITY Subject to the provisions of the Licensee shall be entitled to claim compensation for any direct loss it may have suffered from the Software as a result of a fault on the part of the relevant subject to providing evidence thereof The Licensor s liability is limited to the commitments made under this Agreement and shall not be incurred as a result of in ii direct or consequential loss that is suffered by the Licensee due to the use or performance of the any consequential loss In particular the Parties expressly agree that any or all pecuniary or business shall constitute consequential loss and shall not provide entitlement to any or all compensation from the Licensor Article WARRANTY The Licensee acknowledges that the scientific and technical state of the art when the Software was distributed did not enable all possible uses to be tested and nor for the presence of possible defects to be detected In this the Licensee s attention has been drawn to the risks associated with modifying and or developing and reproducing the Software which are reserved for experienced users The Licensee shall be responsible for by any or all the suitability of the product for its its good working and for ensuring that it shall not cause damage to either persons or properties The Licensor hereby in good that it is entitled to grant all the rights over the other than that provided for in Article in without any warranty as to its commercial its innovative or relevant nature the Licensor does not warrant that the Software is free from any that it will operate without that it will be compatible with the Licensee s own equipment and software nor that it will meet the Licensee s requirements The Licensor does not either expressly or tacitly warrant that the Software does not infringe any third party intellectual property right relating to a software or any other property right the Licensor disclaims any and all liability towards the Licensee arising out of any or all proceedings for infringement that may be instituted in respect of the modification and redistribution of the Software should such proceedings be instituted against the the Licensor shall provide it with technical and legal assistance for its defense Such technical and legal assistance shall be decided on a case by case basis between the relevant Licensor and the Licensee pursuant to a memorandum of understanding The Licensor disclaims any and all liability as regards the Licensee s use of the name of the Software No warranty is given as regards the existence of prior rights over the name of the Software or as regards the existence of a trademark Article TERMINATION In the event of a breach by the Licensee of its obligations the Licensor may automatically terminate this Agreement modify or distribute the Software any licenses that it may have granted prior to termination of the Agreement shall remain valid subject to their having been granted in compliance with the terms and conditions hereof Article MISCELLANEOUS EXCUSABLE EVENTS Neither Party shall be liable for any or all or failure to perform the that may be attributable to an event of force an act of God or an outside such as defective functioning or interruptions of the electricity or telecommunications network paralysis following a virus intervention by government natural water strikes and labor etc Any failure by either on one or more to invoke one or more of the provisions shall under no circumstances be interpreted as being a waiver by the interested Party of its right to invoke said whether written or between the Parties and having the same and constitutes the entirety of the agreement between said Parties concerning said purpose No supplement or modification to the terms and conditions hereof shall be effective as between the Parties unless it is made in writing and signed by their duly authorized representatives In the event that one or more of the provisions hereof were to conflict with a current or future applicable act or legislative said act or legislative text shall and the Parties shall make the necessary amendments so as to comply with said act or legislative text All other provisions shall remain effective invalidity of a provision of the for any reason shall not cause the Agreement as a whole to be invalid LANGUAGE The Agreement is drafted in both French and English and both versions are deemed authentic Article NEW VERSIONS OF THE AGREEMENT Any person is authorized to duplicate and distribute copies of this Agreement So as to ensure the wording of this Agreement is protected and may only be modified by the authors of the License

◆ undertakes

it being understood that the additional cost of purchasing the source code of the Modified Software shall not exceed the cost of transferring the data COMPATIBILITY WITH THE CeCILL LICENSE When a Modified Software contains an Integrated Contribution subject to the CeCill license or when a Derivative Software contains a Related Module subject to the CeCill license the provisions set forth in the third item of Article are optional Article INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY OVER THE INITIAL SOFTWARE The Holder owns the economic rights over the Initial Software Any or all use of the Initial Software is subject to compliance with the terms and conditions under which the Holder has elected to distribute its work and no one shall be entitled to modify the terms and conditions for the distribution of said Initial Software The Holder undertakes that the Initial Software will remain ruled at least by the current for the duration set forth in Article OVER THE INTEGRATED CONTRIBUTIONS A Licensee who develops an Integrated Contribution is the owner of the intellectual property rights over this Contribution as defined by applicable law OVER THE RELATED MODULES A Licensee who develops an Related Module is the owner of the intellectual property rights over this Related Module as defined by applicable law and is free to choose the type of agreement that shall govern its distribution under the conditions defined in Article NOTICE OF RIGHTS The Licensee expressly undertakes
